snippet: Bill Hader and Kristen Wiig are accustomed to sharing the same stage — and keeping a crowd in stitches — since starring on "Saturday Night Live" together from 2005 to 2013. But in their new film "Skeleton Twins," they get melodramatic....

headline.print_headline: Wiig Mainstay for Hader in 'Skeleton Twins'
headline.main: Wiig Mainstay for Hader in 'Skeleton Twins'

lead_paragraph: Bill Hader and Kristen Wiig are accustomed to sharing the same stage — and keeping a crowd in stitches — since starring on "Saturday Night Live" together from 2005 to 2013. But in their new film "Skeleton Twins," they get melodramatic.
